Direct Known Subclasses:
Attribute, AttributeGroupDefinition, ComplexType, Element, ModelGroupDefinition, ModelGroupImplementation, SimpleType
public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object

The parent of all XML Schema components.

toXML

public abstract void toXML(org.kxml.io.XMLWriter writer)
Converts the component to XML representation. This is an abstract method. The concrete implementation is in the subclass of this class.
Parameters:
writer - XMLWriter to write the XML to.
